about.title: about
description: Got my start in software sales at a medium sized company. I learned how to build from the ground up with little to no resources.

I have used my skills to help grow SMBs and Mid-cap companies from good companies, into great companies. Keeping up with AI has helped me become more organized, resulting in quality work for my clients.
Continuing this journey to help companies grow alongside me and flourish in excellence.

contacts.title: contacts
contacts.text: I’m interested in freelance opportunities. However, if you have other request or question, don’t hesitate to contact me
